newsitem.title: FRANCE: EU raises refund on soft wheat flour exports.
newsitem.headline: EU raises refund on soft wheat flour exports.

text.p: The European Union on Thursday raised the daily refund on exports of soft wheat flour to 17.00 Ecus per tonne from a previous level of eight Ecus per tonne, member-country officials said.
It also raised the refund applying to export of durum semolina to 10.50 Ecus per tonne from eight Ecus per tonne. --Paris newsroom +331 4221 5432
